TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含国家/地区的相关信息。

span.span: Contains information about the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同类，类不表示用户首选项和不依赖于用户的语言或区域性。Unlike the class, the class does not represent user preferences and does not depend on the user's language or culture. ## 关联的名称Names Associated with a RegionInfo Object 名称对象是在 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的两个字母代码之一。The name of a object is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 用例并不重要。Case is not significant. ， ，和属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。The , , and properties return the appropriate codes in uppercase. 有关的当前列表名称，请参阅[英语国家/地区名称和代码元素](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 网站上。For the current list of names, see [English country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## 实例化国家Instantiating a RegionInfo Object 若要实例化你传入的对象构造函数的两个字母区域名称，例如"US"美国，或特定区域性的名称例如"EN-US"英语 （美国）。To instantiate a object, you pass the constructor either a two-letter region name, such as "US" for the United States, or the name of a specific culture, such as "en-US" for English (United States). 但是，我们建议你使用特定的区域性名称而不是两个字母区域名称，因为对象不是完全独立于语言的。However, we recommend that you use a specific culture name instead of a two-letter region name, because a object is not completely language-independent. 多个属性，包括， ，和，依赖于区域性名称。Several properties, including , , and , depend on culture names. 下面的示例阐释了种差异表示比利时的三个对象的属性值。The following example illustrates the difference in property values for three objects that represent Belgium. 第一个实例化时从区域名称 (BE) 仅，而从区域性名称实例化第二个和第三 (法语 （比利时） 和荷兰语 （比利时） 的 nl BE 的 fr BE 分别)。The first is instantiated from a region name (BE) only, while the second and third are instantiated from culture names (fr-BE for French (Belgium) and nl-BE for Dutch (Belgium), respectively). 该示例使用反射来检索的属性值的每个对象。The example uses reflection to retrieve the property values of each object. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/propertyvalues1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/propertyvalues1.vb#2)] 在如下所示的情况下，使用区域性名称而非国家/地区名称在实例化对象：In scenarios such as the following, use culture names instead of country/region names when you instantiate a object: - 语言名称时最为重要。When the language name is of primary importance. 例如，对于 es 美国区域性名称，你可能想应用程序以显示"Estados Unidos"而不是"美国"。For example, for the es-US culture name, you'll probably want your application to display "Estados Unidos" instead of "United States". 使用 (US) 而不考虑语言的单独生成"美国"的国家/地区名称，因此你应使用的区域性名称改为。Using the country/region name (US) alone yields "United States" regardless of the language, so you should work with the culture name instead. - 当必须考虑脚本差异。When script differences must be considered. 例如，国家/地区 AZ 处理具有名称 az Latn AZ 和 az 符号 AZ 和 Latin 的阿塞拜疆区域性和西里尔文脚本可能会非常不同此国家/地区。For example, the country/region AZ deals with Azerbaijani cultures that have the names az-Latn-AZ and az-Cyrl-AZ, and the Latin and Cyrillic scripts can be very different for this country/region. - 当维护的详细信息是重要的。When maintenance of detail is important. 返回的值成员可以与不同，具体取决于是否对象实例化使用的区域性名称或区域名称。The values returned by members can differ depending on whether the object was instantiated by using a culture name or a region name. 例如下, 表列出了差异中返回值时通过使用"美国"地区、"EN-US"区域性和"es-美国"区域性实例化对象。For example, the following table lists the differences in return values when a object is instantiated by using the "US" region, the "en-US" culture, and the "es-US" culture. |成员Member|"US""US"|"EN-US""en-US"|"es-US""es-US"| |------------|----------|--------------|--------------| ||美元US Dollar|美元US Dollar|Dólar de EE。UU。Dólar de EE.UU.| ||USUS|en-USen-US|es-USes-US| ||美国United States|美国United States|Estados UnidosEstados Unidos| ||USUS|en-USen-US|es-USes-US| ## Examples 下面的示例演示多个成员类。The following example demonstrates several members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CPP/regioninfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/regioninfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/regioninfo.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 culture) cil managed

span.span: A culture identifier.

summary.span: 基于与指定的区域性标识符关联的国家/地区初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region associated with the specified culture identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是建议用于实例化的构造函数对象。 is the recommended constructor for instantiating a object. 与不同需要数值的区域性标识符作为参数，其参数的构造函数是更具可读性区域性名称或 country 代码。Unlike the constructor that requires a numeric culture identifier as a parameter, its parameter is a more readable culture name or country code. 区域性标识符映射到相应的区域语言支持 (NLS) 区域设置标识符。The culture identifier is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier. 详细的区域性信息将出现在[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。Detailed culture information appears in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 值属性的新通过调用此构造函数实例化的对象是国家/地区、 不组合的语言和国家/地区代码的 ISO 3166 两个字母代码。The value of the property of the new object instantiated by calling this constructor is the ISO 3166 2-letter code for the country/region, not the combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果为英语 （美国） 区域性，值的对象进行实例化使用的区域性标识符 0x0409属性为"美国"。For example, if a object is instantiated with the culture identifier 0x0409 for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "US". 与此相反，如果对象的实例化时使用组合的语言和国家/地区代码 EN-US 用于英语 （美国） 区域性的值属性为"EN-US"。In contrast, if a object is instantiated with the combined language and country/region code en-US for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "en-US". ## Examples 下面的代码示例比较的两个实例以不同的方式创建。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定固定、自定义或非特定区域性。

span.span: specifies either an invariant, custom, or neutral culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 包含 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的由两个字母组成的代码的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains a two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for country/region.
-or-

param.span: 包含特定区域性、自定义区域性或仅适用于 Windows 的区域性的区域性名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the culture name for a specific culture, custom culture, or Windows-only culture.

param.span: 如果区域性名称未采用 RFC 4646 格式，应用程序应指定整个区域性名称，而不是仅指定国家/地区。

span.span: If the culture name is not in RFC 4646 format, your application should specify the entire culture name instead of just the country/region.

summary.span: 基于按名称指定的国家/地区或特定区域性初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region or specific culture, specified by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数是其中任意一个国家/地区，或特定、 自定义，或仅 Windows 区域性名称定义的代码。The `name` parameter is either one of the codes defined for country/region, or a specific, custom, or Windows-only culture name. 用例并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是， 、 ，和属性以大写形式返回指定的代码或区域性名称。However, the , the , and the properties return the specified code or culture name in uppercase. 预定义中列出名称[国家/地区名称和代码元素](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 网站上。The predefined names are listed in [Country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. 应提供特定区域性的名称而不是只是中的国家/地区名称`name`参数。You should provide the name of a specific culture rather than just a country/region name in the `name` parameter. 例如，EN-US 为英语 （美国） 或西班牙语 （美国） 的 es 美国优于美国因为属性，如和反映特定语言。For example, en-US for English (United States) or es-US for Spanish (United States) is preferable to US because properties such as and reflect a specific language. az Latn AZ 或 az 符号 AZ 优于 AZ 因为属性，如， ，和反映特定脚本。az-Latn-AZ or az-Cyrl-AZ is preferable to AZ because properties such as , , and reflect a specific script. 中列出的预定义的区域性名称[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。The predefined culture names are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 请注意，此构造函数调用引发如果`name`是非特定区域性 （如英语 en)。Note that a call to this constructor throws an if `name` is a neutral culture (such as en for English). ## Examples 下面的代码示例比较的两个实例以不同的方式创建。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建的实例使用区域性名称。The following code example creates instances of using culture names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CPP/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CS/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/VB/regioninfo_ctorculturename.vb#1)]

para.span: 此构造函数只接受特定区域性或国家/地区代码。

span.span: This constructor accepts only specific cultures or country/region codes.

para.span: 但是，某些非特定区域性名称是与国家/地区代码相同。

span.span: However, some neutral culture names are the same as country/region codes.

para.span: 在这种情况下，可以解释为国家/地区代码而不是一个非特定区域性名称，并且此构造函数不会引发。

summary.span: 获取该国家/地区中使用的货币的英文名称。

span.span: Gets the name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区中使用的货币的英文名称。

span.span: The name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrencyNativeName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ CurrencyNativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该国家/地区中使用的货币名称，它使用该国家/地区的本地语言格式表示。

span.span: Gets the name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区中使用的货币的本地名称，它使用与 ISO 3166 国家/地区代码关联的语言格式表示。

span.span: The native name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对象创建与特定区域性和相应的国家/地区中, 使用多个语言属性检索与特定区域性关联的货币名称。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property retrieves the currency name associated with the specific culture. 此属性的值取决于与特定的国家/地区关联的语言。The value of this property depends on the language that is associated with a particular country/region. 因此，如果你想要使用属性，应实例化通过传递的对象构造函数的组合的语言和国家/地区代码。Therefore, if you intend to use the property, you should instantiate the object by passing the constructor a combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果，组合语言和国家/地区代码"en-CA"英语 （加拿大） 值的实例化对象其属性是"加拿大美元"。For example, if a object is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "en-CA" for English (Canada), the value of its property is "Canadian Dollar". 如果它，组合语言和国家/地区代码"fr CA"法语 （加拿大） 的值为实例化其属性是"美元 canadien"。If it is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "fr-CA" for French (Canada), the value of its property is "Dollar canadien". 因此，创建`RegionInfo`仅国家/地区名称 (在此情况下的"CA") 与对象不是足够具体，可以将适当的本机货币名称区分开来。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name ("CA" in this case) is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate native currency name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrencySymbol As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ CurrencySymbol { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与国家/地区关联的货币符号。

span.span: Gets the currency symbol associated with the country/region.

value.span: 与国家/地区关联的货币符号。

span.span: The currency symbol associated with the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，美国的货币符号是"$"。For example, the currency symbol for the United States is "$". 如果当前对象创建与特定区域性和相应的国家/地区中, 使用多个语言属性返回与特定区域性关联的货币符号。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property returns the currency symbol associated with the specific culture. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示当前线程所使用的国家/地区的 。

span.span: Gets the that represents the country/region used by the current thread.

value.span: 表示当前线程所使用的国家/地区的 。

span.span: The that represents the country/region used by the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值基于通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分选择的区域性。The value of this property is based on the culture selected through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不会自动检测的更改在系统设置中，但属性将更新，当您调用方法。The class does not automatically detect changes in the system settings, but the property is updated when you call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取以 .NET Framework 本地化版本语言表示的国家/地区的全名。

span.span: Gets the full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework.

value.span: 以 .NET Framework 本地化版本语言表示的国家/地区的全名。

span.span: The full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性显示.NET Framework 本地化版本语言表示的国家/地区名称。The property displays the country/region name in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework. 例如，属性上的西班牙语版本的.NET framework 上的英语版本的.NET Framework 中，和西班牙语用英语显示国家/地区。For example, the property displays the country/region in English on the English version of the .NET Framework, and in Spanish on the Spanish version of the .NET Framework. 值属性则来自当前的用户界面区域性，由表示的语言中的资源文件。The value of the property is taken from the resource files in the language of the current user interface culture, represented by . 自定义区域，或从操作系统合成可能没有资源的信息，这种情况下的值的值相同属性。Custom regions or those synthesized from the operating system might not have resource information, in which case the value for is the same as the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . ## Examples 下面的代码示例比较的两个实例以不同的方式创建。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property GeoId As Integer
public: virtual property int GeoId { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取地理区域、国家/地区、城市或地点的唯一标识号。

span.span: Gets a unique identification number for a geographical region, country, city, or location.

value.span: 一个唯一标识地理位置的 32 位有符号数字。

span.span: A 32-bit signed number that uniquely identifies a geographical location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序应使用属性来为客户提供区域性特定服务。The application should use the property to provide culture-specific services to customers. 例如，属性可以使用作为密钥，若要访问包含有关国家/地区的特定信息的数据库记录。For example, the property can be used as a key to access a database record that contains specific information about a country/region. 此属性的值对应于 Windows`GetUserGeoID`函数。This property value corresponds to the Windows `GetUserGeoID` function. 有关地理标识符的列表，请参阅[地理位置的表](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287)MSDN 库中。For a list of geographical identifiers, see [Table of Geographical Locations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287) in the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

span.span: The three-character ISO 4217 currency symbol associated with the country/region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的名称或 ISO 3166 双字母国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the name or ISO 3166 two-letter country/region code for the current object.

value.span: 构造函数的 参数指定的值。

span.span: The value specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.
-or-

value.span: ISO 3166 中为 构造函数的 参数指定的国家/地区定义的双字母代码。

span.span: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对象创建与构造函数采用区域性标识符参数，属性值是在 ISO 3166 中定义的国家/地区的双字母代码之一，格式为大写。If the current object is created with the constructor that takes a culture identifier parameter, the property value is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region and is formatted in uppercase. 例如，美国的两个字母代码为"美国"。For example, the two-letter code for the United States is "US". 如果当前对象创建与构造函数并传递一个完整的区域性名称，例如"EN-US"属性值是完整的区域性名称并不只是区域名称。If the current object is created with the constructor and is passed a full culture name such as "en-US", the property value is a full culture name and not just the region name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property NativeName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个国家/地区的名称，它使用该国家/地区的本地语言格式表示。

span.span: Gets the name of a country/region formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 该国家/地区的本地名称，它使用与 ISO 3166 国家/地区代码关联的语言格式表示。

span.span: The native name of the country/region formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 属性检索完整的区域性名称，如果`RegionInfo`使用完整的区域性名称构造对象。The property retrieves a full culture name if the `RegionInfo` object is constructed using a full culture name. 我们建议你使用的区域性名称-例如，"EN-US"英语 （美国） — 访问属性。We recommend that you use the culture name—for example, "en-US" for English (United States)—to access the property. 用于此属性的字符串取决于与国家/地区关联的语言。The string used for this property depends on the language associated with the country/region. 例如，为英语 （美国） 区域性名称 en 美国和西班牙语 （美国） 的 es 美国可以检索在 Windows Vista 上的不同值。For example, the culture names en-US for English (United States) and es-US for Spanish (United States) can retrieve different values on Windows Vista. 因此，创建`RegionInfo`具有仅美国国家/地区名称的对象不是不足以明确区分的相应字符串。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name of US is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ThreeLetterISORegionName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ThreeLetterISORegionName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 ISO 3166 中定义的由三个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

value.span: 在 ISO 3166 中定义的由三个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: The three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 ISO 3166 中定义此国家/地区的三个字母代码。The property contains the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for this country/region. 例如，美国的三个字母代码是"USA"。For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA". 用例并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是， 、 ，和属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，美国的三个字母代码是"USA"。For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回的值属性。This method returns the value of the property. 用例并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是， 、 ，和属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. 预定义中列出名称类主题。The predefined names are listed in the class topic.

summary.span: 获取在 ISO 3166 中定义的由两个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: Gets the two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

value.span: 在 ISO 3166 中定义的由两个字母组成的国家/地区代码。

span.span: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称是在 ISO 3166 中为国家/地区定义的两个字母代码之一。The name is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 例如，美国的两个字母代码为"美国"。For example, the two-letter code for United States is "US". > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情况下，属性可能具有两个以上的字符。In some cases, the property may have more than two characters. 例如，值为加勒比海区域的属性是"029"。For example, the value of the property for the Caribbean region is "029". 用例并不重要。Case is not significant. 但是， 、 ，和属性以大写形式返回相应的代码。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. > [!WARNING] > 如果你想要保留对象或进程之间通信，你也应对通过使用完整的区域性名称，而不是两个字母 ISO 区域代码对它进行实例化。If you want to persist a object or communicate it between processes, you should instantiate it by using a full culture name rather than a two-letter ISO region code. 因为属性依赖于脚本和语言中，实例化使用只有一个区域代码的对象失去上下文和数据。Because properties depend on script and language, instantiating a object by using only a region code loses context and data. 预定义中列出名称[英语国家/地区名称和代码元素](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 网站上。The predefined names are listed in [English country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性类。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]
